data.title: Good fried chicken
data.text: We ate the buffet simply because we were dining in.  The advantage to the buffet is that there is a wider variety of vegetable and salad and there is a dessert.  The disadvantage is that the chicken gets dried out and the vegetables are not seasoned at all.  It's not worth it.  The price is not significantly less than a cafe. Take out is much better.  The counter staff are always friendly and get the right food to the customer.  I have to be in a rush to get food to stop here.

data.title: Grandchildren and I are 'regulars'
data.text:
This KFC is very friendly and tries very hard to please customers.  I take my grandchildren often because they LOVE KFC, and this location is their favorite.
It has a buffet which I have not tried, but there are many regular customers especially on days when they have specials.
